name: Vintage  French Burl wood Vine Root Corkscrew Wine Bottle Opener
description:
We love the shape of this vintage wine bottle opener. It is the perfect gift for the wine lovers.

• Burl wood Vine Root 
• Metal screw

name: handmade seamless leather compact coin case
description:
These coin cases have been handmade in Italy for decades using the traditional hand-moulded manufacturing method of Florence.  This technique produces a seamless, elegant and practical wallet.
This piece is our favorite find of the week. It has been sourced in Brooklyn, NY. 
It is unisex, practical and should last a lifetime. 

d e t a i l s:
• Folding Lid
• Gold logo and fleur de lys
• Chocolate polished leather
• Made in Italy
• No Visible Construction Lines

s i z e:
• Measurements: 2,5'' x 2,5''|W:6,5cm x L:6,5cm

name: Hopjes Coffee Candies
description:
By now you should know we have a sweet tooth. We found these gems while on a trip to Amsterdam and decided to share our candies du jour with you.

• Coffee flavor 
• Net wt. 200g
• Product of Holland

name: vintage fitted black bomber
description:
This one-of-a-kind casual coverup is made for city strolls. Layer yours over a relaxed tee with a pencil skirt, adding lacquered loafers for downtown chic. 

DETAILS:
   • Good condition
   • Shell and Body lining 65% Polyester / 35% Cotton
   • Sleeve lining 100% Nylon
   • Dry clean

SIZE+FIT:

    • Shoulder 16 inches / 41cm
    • Armpit 19 inches / 48cm
    • Length 22 inches / 50cm
    • Fitted style

name: Tyvek tote
description:
These Tyvek totes are intentionally crumpled. The bag compartment is assembled from one piece of tear resistant Tyvek paper. It is one of our favorite piece of the season. 

DETAILS
• Designed in Los Angeles, California. 
• Water-resistant & Weight tested at 25 lbs. 
• Fold over for shopping light, or extend out for a full load of goods. 
• It can easily be collapsed & tied, via a loop-knot feature.
• Light Gray with white handles
• Cleaning Instructions: Wipe with a damp towel

SIZE
• Internal Footprint: 13” x 8” x 15”

name: Kishu Binchotan Charcoal All Natural Water Purifier
description:
Made in the Kishu region of Japan, Binchotan (or white charcoal) is activated through an extremely high burning temperature and rapid cooling process. Known as the best quality charcoal for purifying water and air, the variety of benefits from Binchotan charcoals can be found in a number of everyday uses. Whether to absorb chemicals in tap water, deodorize your fridge, enhance blood circulation in a hot bath, stimulate healthy soil in the garden, or deflect negative ions in your home, Binchotan charcoals are a natural way to boost overall wellness.


DETAILS:
• Random assort approx. 1/4lb/100g. Includes 3 to 4 pieces of various thickness and length.
• Made in Japan
• Reusable
• Recyclable
• Can be re-used up to about 3 months

name: Ombre wool blend blue and gray scarf
description:
This scarf is a perfect all year long piece. We found a couple of them in our trip to India. Please check the other models.

DETAILS: 
• Petrol and silver gray 
• Lightweight fabric 
• Frayed trims 
• No label but it is a wool/viscose blend 
• Made in India (no label) 
• Brand new condition

SIZE+FIT: 
• 21,5''x67'' | 70cmx180cm

name: Alantoine Benamôr hand cream
description:
Alantoíne Benamôr citrus-scented is an iconic hand cream from Portugal since 1928. It is a great moisturizer and leaves our dry hands soft and supple.

DETAILS
• Content: 40ml.
• Measurements: 16 x 4.5 x 3 cm
• Weight: 60 gr
• Made in Portugal

INGREDIENTS:
Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Decyl Oleate, Dimethicone, Perfume, Hydroxyethyl, Ethylcellulose, Allantoin, Propylparaben, Methylparaben, Citral & Lemonene

name: JULIA MACHE "Glitz Bag"
description:
Stop looking for the perfect day-to-night bag. Our dear friend Julia Mâché designed the all occasion chameleon tote we've been dreaming of. Chic, lightweight and roomy the clean cut oversized tote is versatile and functional. From downtown shopping to yoga class to evening dining, the shimmery bag never loses its cool.
Crafted from an innovative high quality and strong woven fabric, this carry-all will never let you down. 

• Inside pocket 
• Made in New York.  
• Care:  Dry Clean.
• Color: Black Glitz
• h23'' x w22'' / h59cm x w56cm
• 7'' / 18cm

name: Vintage Eggplant Alligator leather Card Holder
description:
We're all about clean cut, simplicity and sumptuous materials. This one of a kind unisex piece is made from a soft alligator leather and features two sections and departments for your cards, bills or coins. 

DETAILS 
• Eggplant alligator leather
• Nude soft butter lamb leather lining
• Pressure button
• Back pocket
• Round corners
• Good vintage condition 

SIZE
• 4,85'' x 3,85'' / 12,5cm x 7,5cm

name: Padmini Dhoop Sticks
description:
We first found out about Padmini Dhoop Sticks while traveling in India. Since then, it has been a keeper.
This incense is unique as there is no wooden stick at its core. Padmini invented this core-less dhoop over 40 years ago. 
This is a timeless fragrance, semi-sweet soft musky based on a rose balsamic note which is pure and soothing.

• Made in India
• Built in metal "eyelet" to hold lit incense
• 10 sticks in one box 

FREE SHIPPING U.S ONLY

name: Rose wood small scoop
description:
These little wooden tools are perfect to scoop our spices, herbs, sugar and salt while cooking. Crafted from polished rosewood, each piece is unique.

• Wood
• 4” x 1,25'' / 10cm x 3,2cm

name: Red cotton Indian twine
description:
This twine is usually used for Indian ceremonies. We found it useful to work with for our craft projects or to tie our small packages and gifts.

• Red and multi-colored cotton
• Made in India
• 8g

name: Jila  Sugar Free Spearmint Gum + Peppermint Mints
description:
By now you should know how obsessed we are about gums, small mints and neat packaging. Jila gums and mints are made in Australia and packed in a so very elegant compact box we could not resist. The gum  is addictive and the mint is a perfect after-meal-pill. 

• Jila Peppermint mints 0,97oz / 27g
• Jila Sugar Free Spearmint 0,77oz / 22g

FREE SHIPPING U.S ONLY

name: vintage leopard print canvas espadrilles
description:
Espadrilles are the perfect all year long flats. This classic shoe in an unexpected print will give a perfect pop to any outfits. 

d e t a i l s 
• Era: 1990s 
• Printed leopard pattern canvas fabric 
• Leather sole and insole
• Low stacked heel with rubber plate
• Round toe
• Made in Spain
• Good condition

s i z e + f i t 
• 8US | 38,5EU

name: Le Typographe mini pad notebook
description:
Handmade in Brussels, these mini pads are the perfect thank you gift. Unique and useful, you can carry them everywhere and write your notes with elegance.
Printed on Heidelberg printing presses, these blocs are hand assembled, according to the traditional methods of Le Typographe's studio. The  printing technique with mobile leaden and wooden characters is privileged. 

DETAILS:
• Each of the 55 sheets of 2.75" x 4.8" paper are  printed with 6pt neon orange grids 
• Made in Belgium

name: Kamenoko Tawashi Scrubber
description:
This Japanese traditional scrubbing brush with over 100 years in history is made of palm fiber.
Modeled to conform to the palm of the hand, this perfect designed little gem is unchanged since it was introduced in 1907. 
It is an efficient, long-lasting everyday essential in Japanese homes. Perfect for cleaning tool for sinks and bathtubs.
One of our friend is using it to wash her vegetables.
Is is often called 'kamenoko' (turtle) in reference to its shape, its connection to water and its longevity.

• Made of palm fiber
• The natural palm fiber is wrapped around a piece of wire with a hook for hanging
• Made in Japan
• Biodegradable
• 4.5 x 3 x 2" /114 x 76 x 51 mm

name: Lot of wooden chevrons chopsticks
description:
Perfect for everyday use, these wood chopsticks feature different stripes designs. Set aside your fork and enjoy the convenience of chopsticks. 
They come in a lot of five different pairs of chopsticks

name: Two-piece leather cardholder
description:
This one of a kind cardholder is both functional and pleasing to the eyes. Beautifully executed in glazed leather, this compact cardholder is an essential accessory.

DETAILS:
• Cognac glazed leather
• Sliding hard case

SIZE:
• 3''x 2'' | 7,5cm x 5cm

name: Black iron scissors
description:
This pair of scissors is a staple piece in our home. From the kitchen to the office it is a must-have tool.

s i z e 
• Length  6'' | 15cm

name: Liquid Marseille soap fragrance free for sensitive skin
description:
The Marseille soap is a French classic product. This liquid version is made in a cauldron with vegetable oils according to tradition. The pump makes is it easy to use and the elegant glass container can be kept afterwards. 

It is guaranteed free of artificial coloring and free of animal fats.

name: JUNIPER RIDGE White Sage Incense
description:
Sage leaves have been traditionally used by many Native American tribes in purification rituals. Juniper Ridge white sage incense is made in California using only natural herbs. This wild harvested incense is charcoal and perfume free.

Ingredients
• Wild harvested White Sage
• Natural vegetable gum (to hold plant material together)
• Bamboo stick 
• One package contains 40 incense sticks
• Made in California

Scent Notes
• Earth
• Sunlight on varnished desert rock
• Spicy resin

name: WILLIAM EGGLESTON 25 postcards box
description:
Color photographs by William Eggleston
This a Set of 25 different 4 1/4 x 6 in  |10 x 15 cm postcards. They are coming in a little box.
Perfect as a gift or for your personal collection.

name: Santa Maria Novella Carta d'Armenia - Armenian Burning Paper
description:
This little red box of Carta d’Armenia from Santa Maria Novella is our favorite gift that we give to our friends. 
Take a piece of these scented burning papers and fold it like a small accordion and lit it up. Blew out the flame and always place it on a glass or ceramic surface. It will burn like incense for about 5 minutes. It promises to remove any kind of bad odors.
The scent is richer than the regular French Papier d'Arménie and feels more luxurious.
We love to keep the sheets in our closet, our bags and in some of our notebooks.

• Frankincense and myrrh scent
• 18 scented papers per box
• Made in Italy

name: Quilted silver square ring
description:
We love the square style of this vintage ring. The etched details adds something special to it. It is unisex.

• Size: 8
• Hallmarked
• Weight: 5.8g

name: Rainbow woven straw South American shoulder bag
description:
This vintage woven shoulder bag is great for festivals and as a travel accessory.

d e t a i l s:
• Era:1980s
• Structured wicker
• Natural woven straw

• Aztec patterns

• Perfect condition

• Width: 9"

name: Papier d'Arménie | Armenian paper booklet
description:
Papier d'Arménie is a traditional French room deodorizer who perfumes your home and cleans the air at the same time. 
It is still made using the same tradition since 1885.
Just burn a strip of the vanilla scented paper to create a lovely ambiance.
We also love to use the strips to perfume our notebooks and drawers.

• Made in France
• One booklet is containing 27 strips.

description:

name: White Monkey Holding Peach Balm
description:
This scented exotic balm  comes in a little tin. It is a great addition to anyone's first aid kit. From muscle soreness to migraine to bruises and mosquito bites it will save your life. As backpackers we appreciate the small size of the container and of course we are suckers for packaging and love the quirkiness of it.

• 8g
• Ingredients: methyl salicylate, camphor, menthol, eucalyptus oil, cinnamon oil, peppermint oil, clove oil

description:
Black Black (Burakku Burakku) is a Japanese, caffeinated, intensely minty gum. It features a soft charcoal color from cacao and also contains ginseng, Oolong tea extract, and vitamin B3.
Black Black gum is a chic way to improve focus and performance.

name: In Between GUY BOURDIN
description:
This sold out very-hard-to-find monograph reassembles many of the original editorial layouts as they were published in magazines such as French Vogue, British Vogue, and Harper’s Bazaar, offering a new and illuminating critical context in the process.
It is the second publication in Steidldangin’s Guy Bourdin library.
Book design by Shelly Verthime and Pascal Dangin
Introduction by Charlie Scheips.

DETAILS:
   • Hardcover
   • 272 pages
   • 400 photographs, four colour and black and white process   
   • Publisher: Steidl (October 1, 2010)
   • Language: English
   • Printed in Germany

   • ISBN-13: 978-3869300337

name: Yu-Be Lip Balm Original Japanese Formula
description:
Yu-be Lip Balm is a natural miracle to heal your dry and cracked lips. 
The ingredients are based on the original, 50-year old Japanese Yu-Be Moisturizing Skin Cream formula which includes glycerin, vitamin E, and camphor.
As an all-natural lip balm it moisturizes and protects dry, painful, chapped lips and replenishes lost moisture from exposure to heat, cold, and wind.

• Original Japanese Formula
• Vitamin E and Aloe Enriched
• Made in the USA
• Ingredients:
Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Camphor, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera), Bark oil Eupatorium Rebaudianum Bertoni (Stevia) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary Leaf Extract).

name: Vintage wood bag holders

These vintage wood shopping bag holders with metal hooks are perfect  to carry your shopping bags and packages with ease. They are very convenient when you have to carry a box. You just need to attach a string on the hook and voilà !

description:

This traditional technique results in a product that can withstand everyday use and develop a beautiful patina over time.
